name: KIM, JAE YEOP
title: Assistant Professor
description: Prof. Jae Kim is interested in social, cultural, and ethical consequences of emerging technologies. His research focuses on Human Centered Interaction and Intelligent (AI) products and services which includes voice and natural interface. He led various UX design projects such as Microsoft AI Assistant, AI Speaker, AI powered IoT devices and Smart TV at Microsoft Ai, Nokia and Samsung. He majored in communication design at Parsons School of Design in New York and received a master degree in design interactions from Royal College of Arts in London. He also participated in global exhibitions and conferences including Microsoft Ai & Data science Conference, MoMA, London Design Festival, and Helsinki Design Week
